display_long_description:
**Experience the Future of Boxing**

Step into the ring and discover true VR boxing. Boxing Underdog delivers the most authentic simulation ever created—stunning graphics powered by 100% physics-based gameplay. This isn't another boxing game; it's the closest you'll get to real boxing without the actual ring.

[media]

**Revolutionary Damage System**

Our groundbreaking damage engine delivers true-to-life consequences. We've created VR boxing simulation where every strike tells a story on your opponent's face.

[media]

**Multiplayer: Fight the World**

Challenge friends or battle strangers worldwide. Climb the global leaderboards in intense ranked matches where only skill determines the winner.
[media]

**Authentic Physics-Based Gameplay**

Our advanced physics ensures every movement and impact feels real. Feel the weight of each punch and the satisfaction of landing a perfect strike.
[media]

**Train, Learn, Compete in Singleplayer**

Adaptive AI opponents that match your level. Master real boxing techniques, create devastating combos, develop your style. Singleplayer builds champions—multiplayer proves them.

[media]






**Early Access Notice:**  Some features still in development. Gameplay is not final. By purchasing the game now, you'll get the full release at no extra cost when it leaves Early Access.
